title: Flipside
description: The performing arts festival, Flipside, at the Esplanade, will have live performances including comedy shows, puppetry, circus shows and more. There will be a roller rink battle, acrobatics, juggling and balancing acts, plus workshops on circus skills.

title: Anne Maria Lim and the Magic Organ
description: Introduce kids to the pipe organ with Anne Maria Lim and the Magic Organ. This kids’ concert tells a tale of a wizard, by composer Rob Hilcott. The performance is part of the Organ Series, and includes fringe activities such as exhibitions and pipe organ demos!

title: Lang Lang Plays Disney in Concert
description: The legendary Chinese pianist will be performing in Singapore for two days only. Watch him perform some of Disney’s most iconic songs.
venue: The Star Theatre, The Star Performing Arts Centre

title: Peter & Blue’s School Holiday
description: This kid-friendly ballet performance by the Singapore Ballet follows the journey of Peter and his faithful dog, Blue. See what they’re up to on their school holiday escapade, and expect lots of laughter, friendship and imaginative play.

title: The Puppet Master – A Night with Disney Songs
description: Bellography, Singapore’s first cello pop orchestra, is putting on a musical story about a puppet who comes to life and goes on a journey with the man who made him. Disney songs like Beauty and the Beast and A Whole New World are reimagined by local composer Hughes Hong.

title: Symphony in the Gardens
description: Enjoy live music by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO) at the Singapore Botanic Gardens. The SSO will perform classical tunes at the gorgeous Shaw Foundation Symphony Stage.
venue: Shaw Foundation Symphony Stage, Singapore Botanic Gardens

title: Roald Dahl’s Fantastic Mr Fox
description: Follow the adventures of the cunning and courageous Mr Fox, who needs to outsmart some greedy farmers to save his family. This fun kids’ theatre show is all about saving the animal community.

title: Disney’s Fantasia film screening with live orchestra
description: Watch the visually captivating film accompanied by live classical music performed by the Singapore Symphony Orchestra! Expect iconic tunes by Beethoven, Stravinsky, Tchaikovsky, Bach and more.

title: Koko the Great
description: Koko the Great follows the adventures of a little village boy, Koko. Watch him overcome his fear of the unknown and embrace the unexpected fun it brings!

title: Disney Junior Live On Stage!
description: Join Mickey, Minnie, Goofy, the Puppy Dog Pals, and more for the biggest playdate ever, but will ominous weather dampen the fun? Find out if Team Spidey from “Marvel’s Spidey and His Amazing Friends” can uncover who’s behind the mysterious weather and save this playdate!
venue: Singapore Indoor Stadium,  Stadium Walk, Singapore

title: The Tiger Who Came to Tea
description: A tiger shows up at Sophie’s door just in time for tea—and chaos follows! This playful stage adaptation of the classic story, The Tiger Who Came to Tea, is full of songs, magic, and laughs.

title: Babies’ Proms
description: Families are encouraged to move along to the music and explore different orchestra instruments!

title: Ballet Under the Stars
description: Ballet Under the Stars offers a relaxed picnic vibe where you and the kids can enjoy beautiful dance performances together. Singapore Ballet will showcase both classic and modern pieces, like ‘Giselle’ and ‘Incomparable Beauty’.

title: Cocomelon & JJ Live: JJ’s Journey
description: Join JJ and friends as they take the stage for the first time in Singapore at Sands Theatre at Marina Bay Sands. Get ready to sing along and groove to your favourite songs including “Yes Yes, Vegetables”, “Wheels on the Bus”, “Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes” and more!
venue: Sands Theatre at Marina Bay Sands,  Bayfront Ave, -/ The Shoppes, Marina Bay Sands, Singapore
full_address: 10 Bayfront Ave, B1-69/70 The Shoppes, Marina bay sands, Singapore 018971

title: Cirque Alice
description: Cirque Alice is Alice in Wonderland meets acrobatics, contortionists, puppetry, aerialists and more! Be mesmerised by acrobatic performers who’ll keep you at the edge of your seat, paired with classical hits that have been given a contemporary spin.
full_address: 10 Bayfront Ave, B1-69/70 The Shoppes, Marina bay sands, Singapore 018971

title: The Three Billy Goats Gruff
description: The Three Billy Goats Gruff is given a fun musical spin by the Singapore Repertory Theatre. The story follows the three goats’ adventure to cross a bridge in search of food amidst a drought, where they’ll encounter a terrifying troll!
full_address: 100 Victoria St, #03-01 National Library / Lee Kong Chian Reference Library, Singapore 188064

title: Halloween Spooktacular!
description: Bring the kiddos to a fun spooky kids’ concert! Temasek Foundation & Singapore Symphony Orchestra present the fun-filled Halloween Spooktacular! Ready yourself for witches, ghouls, skeletons and more, and don’t worry about the kids sitting still as this one’s a relaxed performance.

title: The Emperor’s New Clothes
description: The Hans Christian Andersen literary folktale takes on a musical spin in this Wild Rice production. The Emperor’s New Clothes is all about the flamboyant Emperor who’s tricked by two cheeky tailors who are out to teach him a lesson.

title: Beauty and the Beast The Musical
description: Step into a magical world this December as Beauty and the Beast The Musical comes to Singapore—its only stop in Asia! Get ready to sing along to your favourite songs like ‘Be Our Guest’ with dazzling costumes, amazing sets, and all your beloved characters brought to life in a totally new way.
full_address: 10 Bayfront Ave, B1-69/70 The Shoppes, Marina bay sands, Singapore 018971

title: Christmas Concert
description: Celebrate the year-end festivities at the Christmas Concert at the Esplanade Concert Hall. You can bet your favourite wintry tunes will make an appearance—you’re even encouraged to sing along!

title: PA Family PLAYGround!
description: Enjoy hands-on workshops, life-sized board games, and family fun at the PA Family PLAYGround. This event features free activities for all ages, including games, workshops, and parent-child workout classes. There will also be a recycling workshop and a digital ledge wall for reflection. Proceeds from the 'Fun Very Bottle' initiative will go to the Community Chest.
